title: Firework Art

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect a wired or wireless switch and a hairdryer to an appliance controller.
• Set the appliance controller to direct mode so the hairdryer is activated while the switch is pressed.
• Pour a small blob of paint onto the black paper.
• Hold the hairdryer above the paint blob and prompt the switch user to hold down their switch to create a firework.
• Repeat the process to create a picture of a night sky filled with fireworks!

tooltipText: Use an appliance controller to use a hairdryer to blow paint on paper to make fireworks
